verses.text_plain: Give ear to my words, O Lord, consider my meditation.
verses.verse_html: 1Give ear to my words, O Lord, consider my meditation.

verses.text_plain: Hearken unto the voice of my cry, my King, and my God: for unto thee will I pray.
verses.verse_html: 2Hearken unto the voice of my cry, my King, and my God: for unto thee will I pray.

tokens.text: for unto thee will I pray

verses.text_plain: My voice shalt thou hear in the morning, O Lord; in the morning will I direct my prayer unto thee, and will look up.
verses.verse_html: 3My voice shalt thou hear in the morning, O Lord; in the morning will I direct my prayer unto thee, and will look up.

tokens.text: unto thee, and will look up

verses.text_plain: For thou art not a God that hath pleasure in wickedness: neither shall evil dwell with thee.
verses.verse_html: 4For thou art not a God that hath pleasure in wickedness: neither shall evil dwell with thee.

verses.text_plain: The foolish shall not stand in thy sight: thou hatest all workers of iniquity.
verses.verse_html:
5The foolish shall not stand in thy sight: thou hatest all workers of iniquity. ▼
▼ in…: Heb. before thine eyes

footnotes.body_html: ▼ in…: Heb. before thine eyes

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt destroy them that speak leasing: the Lord will abhor the bloody and deceitful man.
verses.verse_html:
6Thou shalt destroy them that speak leasing: the Lord will abhor the bloody and deceitful man. ▼
▼ bloody…: Heb. man of bloods and deceit

footnotes.body_text: ▼ bloody…: Heb. man of bloods and deceit
footnotes.body_html: ▼ bloody…: Heb. man of bloods and deceit

verses.text_plain: But as for me, I will come into thy house in the multitude of thy mercy: and in thy fear will I worship toward thy holy temple.
verses.verse_html:
7But as for me, I will come into thy house in the multitude of thy mercy: and in thy fear will I worship toward thy holy temple. ▼
▼ thy holy…: Heb. the temple of thy holiness

tokens.text: But as for me, I will come

footnotes.body_text: ▼ thy holy…: Heb. the temple of thy holiness
footnotes.body_html: ▼ thy holy…: Heb. the temple of thy holiness

verses.text_plain: Lead me, O Lord, in thy righteousness because of mine enemies; make thy way straight before my face.
verses.verse_html:
8Lead me, O Lord, in thy righteousness because of mine enemies; make thy way straight before my face. ▼
▼ mine…: Heb. those which observe me

footnotes.body_text: ▼ mine…: Heb. those which observe me
footnotes.body_html: ▼ mine…: Heb. those which observe me

verses.text_plain: For there is no faithfulness in their mouth; their inward part is very wickedness; their throat is an open sepulchre; they flatter with their tongue.
verses.verse_html:
9For there is no faithfulness in their mouth; their inward part is very wickedness; their throat is an open sepulchre; they flatter with their tongue. ▼
▼ faithfulness: or, stedfastness
 , ▼
▼ their mouth: Heb. his mouth, that is, the mouth of any of them
 , ▼
▼ very…: Heb. wickednesses

footnotes.body_text: ▼ their mouth: Heb. his mouth, that is, the mouth of any of them
footnotes.body_html: ▼ their mouth: Heb. his mouth, that is, the mouth of any of them

verses.text_plain: Destroy thou them, O God; let them fall by their own counsels; cast them out in the multitude of their transgressions; for they have rebelled against thee.
verses.verse_html:
10Destroy thou them, O God; let them fall by their own counsels; cast them out in the multitude of their transgressions; for they have rebelled against thee. ▼
▼ Destroy…: or, Make them guilty
 , ▼
▼ by…: or, from their counsels

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Destroy…: or, Make them guilty
▼ by…: or, from their counsels

verses.text_plain: But let all those that put their trust in thee rejoice: let them ever shout for joy, because thou defendest them: let them also that love thy name be joyful in thee.
verses.verse_html:
11But let all those that put their trust in thee rejoice: let them ever shout for joy, because thou defendest them: let them also that love thy name be joyful in thee. ▼
▼ defendest…: Heb. coverest over, or, protectest them

tokens.text: But let all those that put their trust
them: let them also that love

footnotes.body_text: ▼ defendest…: Heb. coverest over, or, protectest them
footnotes.body_html: ▼ defendest…: Heb. coverest over, or, protectest them

verses.text_plain: For thou, Lord, wilt bless the righteous; with favour wilt thou compass him as with a shield.
verses.verse_html:
12For thou, Lord, wilt bless the righteous; with favour wilt thou compass him as with a shield. ▼
▼ compass: Heb. crown
